title: ”Poppy isnt broken just play a lane bully against her"
body: Yeah its not like Poppy was picked into Jayce at worlds and did really well right? LUL that was when grasp was "bad" and tanks were "shit" times

I'd like to see you make the argument that Shen is broken. Or Taliyah based on Syndra and Viktor. Hell, even Aatrox based on Camille.

> LUL that was when grasp was "bad" and tanks were "shit" times

Lmao are you ok? It implies that Poppy was supposed to be in a "weak" state at that time so Poppy shouldnt be a viable pick into Jayce but we all know what happened. Just use your brain a little bit more tho next time ok?

You're being extremely aggressive and, to be honest, a little rude over something almost everybody in this thread is talking about. All you needed to do was clarify instead of being condescending.

In fact, I could argue that I used my brain TOO MUCH reading between the lines of that statement to find intrinsic meanings that weren't there.

You said tanks in general were implied to be in a weak state. That has never meant that Poppy was ever weak. She has remained powerful for a good while and showcased a lot of usage in proplay. 

So tanks in general being weak has nothing to do with Poppy's individual power because of how her kit works.  In fact, her and Maokai were both doing well, and the only common point I can see between them is that they both have a defensive ability that reduces both physical and magic damage (Maokai ult and Poppy W). Not to mention how good Poppy is a shutting mobile people down.

i may have some mental deficeny put poppy is a Tank / bruiser not just a tank right? She came from being a high damage bruiser to being a slow low damage bruiser / tank that you literally have to stand one place vs to lose any kind of fight.
Eh, I see her as a full tank. Course I see Sion as a full tank as well.

both were intended as fighters though sions rework arguably killed his fighter style (i dont care his his q knocks up for 20 years its stupid for a fighter) he still lacks base defenses if riot wants to classify him as a tank even if he farms to scale  his base health should be slightly higher  maybe shift some of his scaleing damage into base damage and and let his health stack for more per unit killed but most maybe raise the cooldown on his e or but raise the duration of intensity of the armor penetration  and idk if the q stun needs to be rebalanced but idk how long it is now ..
i see poppys rework as trying to be a fighter but ineffective at the job. haveing to q and then wait for it to pop w only stopping one dash would be okay if she was balanced as a fighter but if she is supposed to be a tank why does it only stop one dash let it stop all for the short duration its up or low the cooldown so that it can be used every 4 seconds with about 20% cdr

Sion lacks base damage?  What?

Edit: oh, defenses. Derp. 

His tanking steroid is his health gain passive. It's definitely not great early and in late it doesn't feel impactful all the time because of how durability gets outscaled. Personally I wish he had better base resistances.

Poppy is broken. 
That does not mean the entire Tank Class is broken.
Hecarim is a Diver, so him being broken does not mean Tanks are broken either.

Just clearing that up, a general message for whoever reads it.

First item ldr is never viable unless youre playing in bronze where most gameplay monkeys are

It IS viable. Like rushing Guinsoo's first item on Kayle. Or going for any other item Irelia can build for first item other than Trinity Force. Or being able to pick from a myriad of possible first items for an off-tank Leona top. Heck, Leona top itself. Viable? Yes. Optimal? Not on most cases.

It´s what Riot calls build diversity. It´s why they reintroduced AP ratios into new Warwick's Q. Is it viable for him to build AP? Most definitely, but not without consequences, thus not making it the commonly desired/optimal build.

It has nothing to do with at which rank stuff is being played on/built on. If it works, there is no reason not to consider doing it.

Hence why Pants are Dragon occasionally builds Redemption on Hecarim jungle. Or why Tobias Fate often builds Cull AND Spellthief's Edge on Gangplank. Three not optimal, but very viable items on those champions, respectively.
